content.text: What kind of music do you like?
I like country music.
Really? I love country music too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I like Luke Bryan, Eric Church, and Carrie Underwood.
Nice! I like Luke Bryan and Eric Church too. I'm not a big fan of Carrie Underwood, but I can respect her talent.
Yeah, she's really good. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to work puzzles, read, and write. I'm also a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I like to read and write too. I'm not a teacher, but I work at a bank.
What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is To Kill a Mockingbird.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the way it shows the importance of empathy and understanding.
Yeah, that's a great message. What's your favorite thing to write about?
I like to write about my experiences and observations.
That sounds really interesting. I'm an aspiring fiction writer, so I like to write about imaginary worlds and characters.
That's cool! I've never tried writing fiction, but it sounds like it could be fun.
It is! It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
Yeah, I can see that. I'm always impressed by people who can write well.
Thanks! It's something I've always been passionate about.
That's great! I'm glad you've found something you love to do.
Me too! I'm really lucky to be a teacher and a writer.
That's wonderful! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
